Subject: Re: Energon hunt
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron sees that Autofrie will not start it, so he must. He flies up from
the trees, and in to plain view of all the Decepticons. Looking as Majestic
as he can he questions, "Dont you recognize me Motormaster? Ive come back,
to rule".

Motormaster dosent get it. His jaw hangs down low, his mouth wide open from
shock. They had not found the body of Megatron yet, to bring to life. What
was this, some kind off Maximal trick.
